name: dot
content: Drawing a dot is one of the ways to draw with the turtle. There are many things you can draw with just dots and lines, along with the ability to change the pen color, line thickness and dot radius.

Example: Large Dot
Example: Fill the Screen

examples.name: Example: Dalmatian
examples.description: Draw a lot of random sized dots at random locations.

palette_params.name: radius
palette_params.description: The radius (in pixels, greater than zero) of the dot to draw

return_value: No return value. Outputs to the display only.
tips:
- When drawing small dots, make sure you move or hide the turtle so you can actually see them.
- Draw a huge dot to color the screen all one color.
